TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It belongs to the family of drugs called protein kinase inhibitors. Also called L-threo-dihydrosphingosine.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento de cáncer. Es un tipo de inhibidor de la proteína cinasa. También se llama L-tri-dihidroesfingosina.
